alert.note: Alert for Grant; Kay (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 5:28PM CDT until May 31 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN KAY AND NORTHEASTERN GRANT COUNTIES... At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of South Haven, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Braman, Renfrow, Chilocco and Blackwell Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
